ModMetaData.name: EdB Prepare Carefully [German Translation]
ModMetaData.author: ChMMoU
ModMetaData.description:
This mod contains the German translation for the mod EdB Prepare Carefully 1.3.x.
Important: It is mandatory to have EdB Prepare Carefully installed for the mod to work.
Original Mod: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=735106432]EdB.PrepareCarefully[/url] Fork Mod: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2881889414][1.4 FORK] EdB Prepare Carefully[/url]
Notice: If the original author updates his mod I will update this mod again
German Transaltion by ChMMoU.
